resources.string:
WordBoggle! A game with never ending fun...well maybe not, but it is definitely a classic! 

Match touching tiles up-and-down or left-and-right to create words. 

Sit back and relax as your literacy skills wow your friends! Rack up the points and show them why you are the WordBoggle master!

10 points: E, A, I, O, N, R, T, L, S, U
20 points: D, G
30 points: B, C, M, P
40 points: F, H, V, W, Y
50 points: K
80 points: J, X
100 points: Q, Z
This game is dedicated to my family and friends who both put up with me and help me out along the way!\n
